trans-unit.source: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Especifica informações sobre como um documento é impresso, incluindo a impressora que o imprime, ao imprimir com base em um aplicativo Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you access a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> through <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to modify printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você acessa um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades para modificar as configurações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: The most common printer setting is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, which specifies the printer to print to.
trans-unit.target: A configuração mais comum de impressora é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, que especifica a impressora selecionada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir com formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir imprime um documento na impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo tem três pré-requisitos:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `filePath` foi definido para o caminho do arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Um método chamado `pd_PrintPage`, que trata o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, foi definido.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `printer` foi definido como o nome da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa todos os campos com seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to set settings for the printer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não criar uma instância de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, mas em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para definir as configurações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a impressora dá suporte à impressão nos dois lados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports double-sided printing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a impressora der suporte à impressão nos dois lados; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> to one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> values.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir usando duplex e, se a impressora oferecer suporte a ele, definir <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> para uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> valores.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o documento impresso é agrupado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printed document is collated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o documento impresso for agrupado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Agrupamento é executada somente quando o número de cópias é maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to specify the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> propriedade para especificar o número de cópias a serem impressas.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Collate%2A> to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Collate%2A> para `true` imprimirá uma cópia completa do documento antes da primeira página da próxima cópia é impressa.

trans-unit.source: `false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.
trans-unit.target: `false` imprimirá cada página, o número de cópias especificado antes de imprimir a próxima página.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de cópias do documento a serem impressas.

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: O número de cópias a serem impressas.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.
trans-unit.target: Nem todas as impressoras suportam imprimindo várias lida.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> para determinar o número máximo de cópias o impressora oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se o número de cópias é definido como maior que o máximo de cópias a impressora dá suportado, apenas o número máximo de cópias será impresso e nenhuma exceção ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.
trans-unit.target: Algumas impressoras podem não suportar a impressão de mais de uma cópia por vez.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information that is useful when creating a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora úteis ao criar um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains information from a printer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> método, você pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para a impressora sem criar um trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para tomar decisões sobre como a layout de elementos visuais como fontes, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de um trabalho de impressão complexas.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the origin at the margins; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar a origem nas margens; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information, optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora, especificando opcionalmente a origem nas margens.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> método, você pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para a impressora sem criar um trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para tomar decisões sobre como a layout de elementos visuais como fontes, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de um trabalho de impressão complexas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to retrieve a graphics object for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> para o qual recuperar um objeto de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora associadas ao <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> método, você pode obter um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para a impressora sem criar um trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para tomar decisões sobre como a layout de elementos visuais como fontes, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de um trabalho de impressão complexas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> para o qual recuperar um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the origin at the margins; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para especificar a origem nas margens; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> associated with the specified page settings and optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> associado às configurações de página especificadas e opcionalmente especificando a origem nas margens.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que contém informações de impressora do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method allows you to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> método permite que você obtenha um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para a impressora sem criar um trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para tomar decisões sobre como a layout de elementos visuais como fontes, tamanhos e estilos de tipo de um trabalho de impressão complexas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de página padrão para essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> that represents the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> que representa as configurações de página padrão para essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de página incluem o tamanho das margens da página, o tamanho do papel a ser usado e se deseja imprimir em cores.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page settings, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as configurações de página, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a configuração da impressora para imprimir nos dois lados.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é determinado pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> property to check to see if the printer supports duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> propriedade para verificar se a impressora oferecer suporte a impressão duplex.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex" /> property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex" /> não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de página da primeira página a ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: The page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: O número de página da primeira página a ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades são usadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o usuário seleciona um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para permitir que o usuário especifique um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requer o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> seja especificado e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> valor esteja dentro do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, de modo a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> para determinar o que deve ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades para determinar quais páginas devem ser impressos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, em seguida, especifique a saída somente para páginas selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> também podem ser definidas programaticamente, porém o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementação é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> property's value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> da propriedade é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> que corresponde às configurações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> que corresponde às configurações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` estruturas são específicos do dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copiando um `DEVMODE` estrutura de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para uma impressora diferente não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver terminado com o identificador que é criado por esse método, você deverá desalocá-lo por conta própria chamando o Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` método.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chamar esse método, passar como um parâmetro de valor de retorno de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível recuperar as informações de inicialização da impressora.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> object that the <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure's handle corresponds to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> ao qual o identificador <see langword="DEVMODE" /> da estrutura corresponde.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer and the page settings specified through the <paramref name="pageSettings" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> que corresponde às configurações de impressora e de página especificadas por meio do parâmetro <paramref name="pageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` estruturas são específicos do dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copiando um `DEVMODE` estrutura de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para uma impressora diferente não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver terminado com o identificador que é criado por esse método, você deverá desalocá-lo por conta própria chamando o Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` método.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chamar esse método, passar como um parâmetro de valor de retorno de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível recuperar as informações de inicialização da impressora.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> que corresponde às configurações da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVNAMES" />.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver terminado com o identificador que é criado por esse método, você deverá desalocá-lo por conta própria chamando o Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` método.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevnames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chamar esse método, passar como um parâmetro de valor de retorno de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevnames%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os nomes de todas as impressoras instaladas no computador.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection" /> that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection" /> que representa os nomes de todas as impressoras instaladas no computador.

trans-unit.source: You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a coleção de nomes de impressora instalados para fornecer ao usuário uma opção de impressoras para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboInstalledPrinters` combo box with the installed printers and also sets the printer to print, using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir preenche a `comboInstalledPrinters` caixa de combinação com as impressoras instaladas e também define a impressora selecionada, usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> propriedade, quando a seleção é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine is called when the form is being initialized.
trans-unit.target: O `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` rotina é chamada quando o formulário está sendo inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se a caixa de combinação específico existe.

trans-unit.source: The available printers could not be enumerated.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível enumerar as impressoras disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates the default printer, except when the user explicitly sets <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designa a impressora padrão, exceto quando o usuário define <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> explicitamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designates the default printer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designar a impressora padrão; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> always returns `false` when you explicitly set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property to a string value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> sempre retorna `false` quando você define explicitamente o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> propriedade para um valor de cadeia de caracteres diferente de `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um formulário e chamada `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` do construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the printer supports printing an image file.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a impressora dá suporte à impressão de um arquivo de imagem.

trans-unit.source: The image to print.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports printing the specified image file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a impressora dá suporte à impressão do arquivo de imagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports printing the specified image; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a impressora der suporte à impressão da imagem especificada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> to print.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> a ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the printer supports printing the specified image format.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a impressora dá suporte à impressão do formato de imagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports printing the specified image format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a impressora der suporte à impressão do formato de imagem especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a impressora é uma plotadora.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer is a plotter; <see langword="false" /> if the printer is a raster.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a impressora é uma plotadora; <see langword="false" /> se a impressora é uma varredura.

trans-unit.source: A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based.
trans-unit.target: Uma plotadora é uma impressora que é baseado em vetor em vez de baseado em varredura.

trans-unit.source: Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das impressoras baseado em vetor use canetas plotagem individuais para produzir saída.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates a valid printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designa uma impressora válida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates a valid printer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designar uma impressora válida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando você obter ou definir algumas propriedades, uma impressora válida é necessária caso contrário, será gerada uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To avoid exceptions, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> property after setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> to safely determine if the printer is valid.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar exceções, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> propriedade depois de definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> com segurança determinar se a impressora é válida.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, and if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir especifica a impressora de destino, definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> propriedade e se o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> é `true`, o documento é impresso na impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo tem três pré-requisitos:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `filePath` foi definido para o caminho do arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Um método chamado `pd_PrintPage`, que trata o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, foi definido.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `printer` foi definido como o nome da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ângulo, em graus, em que a orientação retrato é girada para produzir a orientação paisagem.

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo, em graus, em que a orientação retrato é girada para produzir a orientação paisagem.

trans-unit.source: Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos de rotação são 90 e 270 graus.

trans-unit.source: If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Se não há suporte para o cenário, o valor de rotação somente válido é de 0 graus.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true` para imprimir uma página em formato paisagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número máximo de cópias que a impressora permite ao usuário imprimir por vez.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de cópias a impressora permite que o usuário de impressão por vez.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> propriedade para o número de cópias a serem impressas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> propriedade para determinar se sua impressora oferecer suporte a impressão várias cópias de cada vez, porque algumas impressoras não.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> ou o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> máximo que pode ser selecionado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: O máximo <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> que pode ser selecionado um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades são usadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o usuário seleciona um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para permitir que o usuário especifique um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> values programmatically, ensure that they are within the range defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> properties, or an exception is thrown when displaying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valores programaticamente, certifique-se de que eles estejam dentro do intervalo definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> propriedades ou uma exceção é gerada ao exibir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> ou o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> mínimo que pode ser selecionado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The minimum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: O mínimo <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> que pode ser selecionado um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades são usadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o usuário seleciona um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para permitir que o usuário especifique um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> values programmatically, ensure that they are within the range defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> properties, or an exception is thrown when displaying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valores programaticamente, certifique-se de que eles estejam dentro do intervalo definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> propriedades ou uma exceção é gerada ao exibir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os tamanhos de papel com suporte por essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection" /> that represents the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection" /> que representa os tamanhos de papel com suporte por essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> instances that represent the paper sizes through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection> contém <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> instâncias que representam os tamanhos de papel a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper size through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você define o tamanho do papel da página por meio do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade válido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um tamanho de papel personalizado, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir preenche a `comboPaperSize` caixa de combinação com a impressora do suporte para tamanhos de papel.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, um tamanho de papel personalizado é criado e adicionado à caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A> é identificado como a propriedade que fornece a cadeia de caracteres de exibição para o item que está sendo adicionado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> propriedade da caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se a caixa de combinação específico existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper source trays that are available on the printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as bandejas de fonte de papel que estão disponíveis na impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection" /> that represents the paper source trays that are available on this printer.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection" /> que representa as bandejas de fonte de papel que estão disponíveis nesta impressora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> instances that represent the paper source trays through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection> contém <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> bandejas por meio da fonte de instâncias que representam o papel a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper source through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você define a fonte de papel de uma página por meio do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade válido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir preenche a `comboPaperSource` caixa de combinação com a impressora do suporte para fontes de papel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> é identificado como a propriedade que fornece a cadeia de caracteres de exibição para o item que está sendo adicionado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> propriedade da caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se a caixa de combinação específico existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da impressora a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: O nome da impressora a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: After setting the printer name, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system.
trans-unit.target: Depois de definir o nome da impressora, chamada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> para determinar se o nome da impressora é reconhecido como uma impressora válida no sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A> property to get a list of printers installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A> propriedade para obter uma lista de impressoras instaladas no sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, and if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir especifica a impressora de destino, definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> propriedade e se o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> é `true`, o documento é impresso na impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo tem três pré-requisitos:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `filePath` foi definido para o caminho do arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Um método chamado `pd_PrintPage`, que trata o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, foi definido.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `printer` foi definido como o nome da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets all the resolutions that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todas as resoluções com suporte por essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection" /> that represents the resolutions that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection" /> que representa as resoluções com suporte por essa impressora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> instances that represent the printer resolutions supported through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection> contém <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> instâncias que representam as resoluções de impressora têm suportadas por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper source through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você define a fonte de papel de uma página por meio do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade válido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> is `Custom`, then use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the custom printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> é `Custom`, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> propriedades para determinar a resolução de impressão personalizada nas direções horizontais e verticais, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPrintResolution` combo box with the supported resolutions.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir preenche a `comboPrintResolution` caixa de combinação com as resoluções com suporte.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se a caixa de combinação específico existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do arquivo, ao imprimir para um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do arquivo, ao imprimir para um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: for read access when getting the file name and write access when setting the file name.
trans-unit.target: para acesso de leitura ao obter o nome de arquivo e o acesso de gravação ao definir o nome do arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: Relacionado a enumeração <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page numbers that the user has specified to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os números de página que o usuário especificou para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> propriedade é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>. quando o usuário seleciona um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is `AllPages`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é `AllPages`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar o usuário especificar um intervalo de páginas a serem impressas, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar o usuário especificar as páginas selecionadas para imprimir, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, de modo a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> para determinar o que deve ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades para determinar quais páginas devem ser impressos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, em seguida, especifique a saída somente para páginas selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> também podem ser definidas programaticamente, porém o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementação é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange" /> property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange" /> não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printing output is sent to a file instead of a port.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a saída de impressão é enviada para um arquivo em vez de uma porta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a saída de impressão é enviada para um arquivo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects the **Print to file** option.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> propriedade é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o usuário seleciona o **imprimir em arquivo** opção.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, a porta de saída é definida como "FILE", fazendo com que o subsistema de impressão do Windows solicitar ao usuário para um arquivo de nome quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> property is only used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and cannot be set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> propriedade só é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> e não pode ser definido programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The `Print to file` option only appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O `Print to file` opção aparece somente no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes do identificador determinado para o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific and copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` estruturas são específicas de dispositivo e copiar um `DEVMODE` estrutura de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> para uma impressora diferente não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de impressora não é válido.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes do identificador determinado para o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da impressora é inválido.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta impressora dá suporte à impressão colorida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this printer supports color; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a impressora oferecer suporte a cor. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To print using color, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir usando cores e, se a impressora oferecer suporte a ele, definir <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir imprime um documento com a primeira página na cor, se a impressora oferecer suporte a ele.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> events are handled.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` tiver sido criado e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> eventos são processados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número da última página a ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: O número da última página a ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades são usadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando o usuário seleciona um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para permitir que o usuário especifique um intervalo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> also requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> também requer o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> seja especificado e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valor esteja dentro do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processo de impressão no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, de modo a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> para determinar o que deve ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> propriedades para determinar quais páginas devem ser impressos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, em seguida, especifique a saída somente para páginas selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> também podem ser definidas programaticamente, porém o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementação é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> in string form.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> na forma de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres.
